a-dropdown/disabled.description: whether the dropdown menu is disabled

a-dropdown/getPopupContainer.description: to set the container of the dropdown menu. The default is to create a div element in body, you can reset it to the scrolling area and make a relative reposition. example

a-dropdown/overlayClassName.description: Class name of the dropdown root element

a-dropdown/overlayStyle.description: Style of the dropdown root element

a-dropdown/placement.description: placement of pop menu: bottomLeft bottomCenter bottomRight topLeft topCenter topRight

a-dropdown/trigger.description: the trigger mode which executes the drop-down action

a-dropdown/visible.description: whether the dropdown menu is visible
